simpplle.comcode

Class Simpplle

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpplle.comcode.Simpplle

  • public final class Simpplle
extends java.lang.Object
    The University of Montana owns copyright of the designated documentation contained within this file as part of the software product designated by Uniform Resource Identifier UM-OpenSIMPPLLE-1.0. By copying this file the user accepts the University of Montana Open Source License Contract pertaining to this documentation and agrees to abide by all restrictions, requirements, and assertions contained therein. All Other Rights Reserved.

    This class contains several functions which implement user requested actions. This class also provides static public storage of the Zone, Area, and Simulation instances. These variables are referenced throughout the package.

      • saveCurrentArea

        public void saveCurrentArea(java.io.File outputFile)
                     throws SimpplleError
        Saves the current area in the Area input file format. Simulation data is also saved if present. The file saved as a gzip to conserve disk space.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - is a File.
        Throws:
        SimpplleError

      • createGisDecadeProbabilityFiles

        public void createGisDecadeProbabilityFiles(java.io.File file)
                                     throws SimpplleError
        This method creates GIS data files for use in Arcview. The files contains information on decade probabilities for species, size class, density, and processes There is one file for each time step.
        Parameters:
        file - is a File, the output file.
        Throws:
        SimpplleError

                 boolean doGisFiles)
                   throws SimpplleError

        Throws:
        SimpplleError

      • resetSimulation

        public static void resetSimulation()
        This function only used in the gui. It is used to restore the units to their original state, as well as deleting any simulation related stuff. This is no longer used before a simulation, the reseting of things is done as needed when the simulation is run. The name resetSimulation is kept primary for consistency with prior versions of this software.

        public static void makeAreaSimulationReady()

        Throws:
        SimpplleError

      • summaryReport

        public void summaryReport(java.io.File file,
                 int format,
                 boolean combineLifeforms)
                   throws SimpplleError
        This Method prints out a summary report to a file. The report is a summary of acres for processes in Evu instances broken down by time step.
        Parameters:
        file - is a File
        Throws:
        SimpplleError

      • multipleRunSummaryReport

        public void multipleRunSummaryReport(java.io.File file)
        This Method prints out a summary report to a file. This report show means, and min/max values for processes, species, size class, and density broken down by time step.
        Parameters:
        file - is a File
